metadata.synopsis: An AD that triggers when players interact with a deactivated soul pillar.There are four different pillars in Foyer room, each one should have different description of what should happen with the souls inside. The idea of AD to hint on what's happening to the souls that Raphael collects.If players didn't succeed on a preceeding skillcheck, they don't learn anything about the souls.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *You feel the hunger and desire of countless souls, bound to the pillar, unable to escape.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *A faint spark of arcane power flickers across the surface of the pillar.*
